review: I needed something to help me stream Beach Body On Demand because my Samsung Smart TV isn't all that smart... LOL. This did the job and because all my other devices are Apple it works seamlessly. I love that I can play all my iTunes music from my TV plus it's easier to access the Internet on my iPad and just mirror it on my TV when I want to watch YouTube videos on the big screen. I'm glad I got this over the Google Chrome product just because set up was a breeze and it works without glitches.
